content: I was thinking of making the Italian-Style Chicken Casserole, but I'm not sure how to keep it warm during transport. Would it be better to use a thermally insulated container or a chafing dish with a heat source? Also, I was thinking of making some deviled eggs as a side dish, similar to my aunt Mary's famous deviled eggs that were a hit at our family's Easter reunion. Do you have any tips on how to make them extra special?
